doc.title: Who's Next? The 2008 NJT Masters
doc.plot: "Who's Next: The Nike Junior Tour Masters" is a behind-the-scenes look at Nike's annual tennis extravaganza featuring the greatest Junior players from around the globe. This fast-paced documentary-style production follows the efforts of young tennis players from 24 different countries as they square off to be crowned the best in the world. For the first time ever viewers will get an inside look at the inner workings of Junior tennis at it's most elite level. The piece follows the world's best junior players and draws insight from professionals in the world of tennis for a unique view at the future of the sport. From the airport to the tennis court to the victory celebration, "Who's Next" provides a unique perspective of the most grandiose amateur tennis tournament the world has seen.
